        move()

worlds/menus/reeborg_intro_en.json.Hurdle 3:
def turn_right():
    for i in range(3):
        turn_left()

def jump():
    turn_left()
    move()
    turn_right()
    move()
    turn_right()
    move()
    turn_left()
while not at_goal():
    wall_check = wall_in_front()
    if wall_in_front():
        jump()
    else:
        move()
